item.title: Product archive layout Shop Organic Farm
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay
item.content:encoded:
Shop

Home Shop
  • Milk
  • Butter
  • Yogurt
  • Sour Cream
  • Cheese

Organic Farm Milk

From animal welfare to additives, food produced to organic standards must be certified by law, so you can be assured that the final product.

Compare

Organic fresh milk

Milk $3.78 – $15.12ea ($15.12/gal) Rated 5.00 out of 5 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, vix in decore scripserit, sit nostro eligendi oporteat eu. Add to wishlist Select options Quick view Compare

Organic Milk Pasteurized

Milk $5.46 – $16.39ea ($15.12/gal) Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, vix in decore scripserit, sit nostro eligendi oporteat eu. Add to wishlist Select options Quick view

    Organic Farm Butter

    Organic cows are truly free-range; they must have plenty of space, access to pasture when weather conditions permit, and spend as much time outdoors as possible.

    Compare

    Salted Butter

    Butter $1.60 – $6.40ea ($6.4/lb) Rated 5.00 out of 5 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, nulla probatus oportere pro ut, at iisque ocurreret qui, qui everti nusquam eu. Mundi appetere et sit, iracundia interesset consequuntur nec an. Sumo nibh repudiare at has, no pri eruditi percipit. Aeterno ancillae conceptam quo ei. Pro dicta virtute tincidunt eu, cu scripta deterruisset nec, minimum reprimique conclusionemque ius an. Nutritional Information Per 100g / 32g Energy 347kcal / 116kcal Energy Kj 1565Kj / 485Kj Fat 4.7g / 1.4g Ingredients 100% fresh organic cow milk Add to wishlist Select options Quick view Hot Compare

    Unsalted Butter

    Butter $1.40 – $5.60ea ($5.6/lb) Rated 5.00 out of 5 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, vix in decore scripserit, sit nostro eligendi oporteat eu. Add to wishlist Select options Quick view

      Organic Farm Yogurt

      Reducing stress and disease in dairy cows by giving them plenty of space and allowing them to behave naturally in a suitable environment means there is no need.

      Compare

      Yogurt Apple

      Yogurt $6.004 oz ($24.00/lb) Rated 5.00 out of 5 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, vix in decore scripserit, sit nostro eligendi oporteat eu. Add to wishlist Add to cart Quick view New Compare

      Yogurt Banana

      Yogurt $6.004 oz ($24.00/lb) Rated 5.00 out of 5 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, nulla probatus oportere pro ut, at iisque ocurreret qui, qui everti nusquam eu. Pro dicta virtute tincidunt eu, cu scripta deterruisset nec, minimum reprimique conclusionemque ius an. Nutritional Information Per 100g / 32g Energy 347kcal / 116kcal Energy Kj 1565Kj / 485Kj Fat 4.7g / 1.4g Ingredients 100% fresh organic cow milk Add to wishlist Add to cart Quick view Compare

      Yogurt Blueberry

      Yogurt $6.004 oz ($24.00/lb) Rated 5.00 out of 5 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, vix in decore scripserit, sit nostro eligendi oporteat eu. Add to wishlist Add to cart Quick view

        Organic Farm Sour Cream

        Organic animals must be fed a natural and organic diet. For cows, this means a grass-rich diet.This helps minimise the risk of antimicrobial resistance and protect.

        Hot Compare

        Sour Cream

        Sour cream $12.204 oz ($48.80/lb) Rated 5.00 out of 5 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, nulla probatus oportere pro ut, at iisque ocurreret qui, qui everti nusquam eu. Mundi appetere et sit, iracundia interesset consequuntur nec an. Sumo nibh repudiare at has, no pri eruditi percipit. Aeterno ancillae conceptam quo ei. Pro dicta virtute tincidunt eu, cu scripta deterruisset nec, minimum reprimique conclusionemque ius an. Nutritional Information Per 100g / 32g Energy 347kcal / 116kcal Energy Kj 1565Kj / 485Kj Fat 4.7g / 1.4g Ingredients 100% fresh organic cow milk Add to wishlist Add to cart Quick view Compare

        Sour Organic Cream

        Sour cream $14.394 oz ($48.80/lb) Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, vix in decore scripserit, sit nostro eligendi oporteat eu. Add to wishlist Add to cart Quick view

          Organic Farm Cheese

          The use of additives and processing aids is heavily restricted in organic products, and certified organic processed foods containing dairy must be made using methods.

          Compare

          Cheese

          Cheese $9.121 lb ($9.12/lb) Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, vix in decore scripserit, sit nostro eligendi oporteat eu. Add to wishlist Add to cart Quick view Compare
